item.title: Mercurial on Bluehost
item.description: vim ~/.bash_profile export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=”$HOME/packages/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH” export PYTHONPATH=”$HOME/packages/lib/python2.3/site-packages:$PYTHONPATH” export PATH=”$HOME/packages/bin:$HOME/bin:$PATH” source ~/.bash_profile vim ~/.bashrc PATH=$PATH:$HOME/bin:$HOME/packages/mercurial source ~/.bashrc Create folders (Please note, from now on my assumption is that your web directory is located at $HOME/public_html, please change the related parts if your configuration is different): cd mkdir install_files mkdir packages mkdir ~/public_html/hg mkdir ~/public_html/hg/repos Get Mercurial and install: cd ~/packages wget http://selenic.com/repo/hg-stable/archive/tip.tar.gz tar zxf tip.tar.gz mv tip.tar.gz ~/install_files/ mv Mercurial* mercurial cd mercurial #dont' forget to change the username echo -e "[ui]\nusername=YOURUSERNAME &lt;YOUREMAIL@WEB.
